# init(archiveURL:)

**Initializer**

Loads a reference object from the specified file URL.

## Declaration

```swift
init(archiveURL url: URL) throws
```

## Parameters

- **url**: The local file URL containing the reference object to load.

## Return Value

The reference object contained in the file.

## Discussion

To use the object for detection in a world-tracking AR session, add it to the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARWorldTrackingConfiguration/detectionObjects] set in your session configuration.

## Loading Reference Objects

- **referenceObjects(inGroupNamed:bundle:)**: Loads all reference objects in the specified AR Resource Group in your Xcode project’s asset catalog.
